import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import './RegisterStyle.css' import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import * as yup from 'yup' const PASS_REGEX = /^(?=.*\d)(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*[a-zA-Z]).{8,}$/ const validationSchema=yup.object({ username:yup.string().min(3,"") }) const RegisterForm = () => { const onSubmit = (values) => { alert(JSON.stringify(values)) } const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { username: '', email: '', password: '', confirm_password: '' }, validateOnBlur: true, onSubmit }) const valid = false; // const invalid = true; return (
